author: kmalhi
msg: Validation messages in Hindi language. Messages_hi_input.txt contains hindi language characters , which are then fed to nativetoascii command to generate Messages_hi.properties. Messages_hi_input.txt should not be checked in though, but do not want to lose it as this conversion is still an ongoing process

author: kmalhi
msg: Fixed path separator to be independent of underlying OS. Was set in a unix compatible way so would break on windows.

author: danielsh
msg: (write_config): Document that 'svnadmin verify' will access (and thus create)
rep-cache.db regardless of whether rep-sharing (of new reps) is enabled

author: stack
msg: HBASE-3872 Hole in split transaction rollback; edits to .META. need to be rolled back even if it seems like they didn't make it
